### Workflow

```{mermaid}
flowchart LR
  A[Population size] --> B[No] & C[Yes]
  B --> D[Direct data] & E[Indirect data]
  D --> F[Nesting female counts]
  E --> G[Nest counts]
  G --> H[Perfect nest counts] & I[Imperfect nest counts]
  I --> J[Nest count imputation]
  
 click J "https://pifsc-protected-species-division.github.io/population_assessment/content/s1_imputation/imputation.html" "Go to Nest Imputation"

  
```
